title: FEAST Activity
synopsis: This form of writing and co-creation that we explore is new. It is an unusual and new way to collaborate, one which encourages us to share our early thoughts as we see them pass from hand to hand. This process we have called before [[Writing With Strangers]].

title: XH2027
synopsis: XH2027 is short for Exponentially Human Twenty Twenty-Seven. It will be held on 16-18 September 2027 and will be a celebration. The idea behind the event is that we can affect the future. Imagining it is a good first step. How much we have to celebrate in 2017 depends in no small way on how well we imagine it now.
